text: Que Rei Sou Eu? (English: What King Am I?) was a 1989 Brazilian telenovela created by Cassiano Gabus Mendes. It's starring Edson Celulari and Giulia Gam in the lead roles. == Cast == {|class="wikitable sortable" |- bgcolor="#CCCCCC" ! Actor !!
